name: Drunken Darts
description: Just your regular dart game with a twist! You see, you had a bit too much to drink tonight and you are playing darts. Your accuracy has gone a bit dull and you cannot aim correctly. You're so freaking drunk in fact, that you can't even KEEP SCORE CORRECTLY! (ngl that just make the game funnier). Note that the game isn't finished yet so its kind of glitchy. Press space to throw a dart! Move your mouse to aim! You have only eight darts so use them wisely. dedicated to muyb
